title: Not Far Not Close - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life
tags: Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Short Story
author: Rao Xueman   饶雪漫
description:
Since the death of Bowen, the boy she loved, Tianyi has secretly heartbroken, difficult to let go, and innocently fall to entanglement with girlfriends Ye Xixi and Yu Feng. So annoyed until she began to like to listen the singing of boy next door Ling Xia on the balcony. Their band’s song fresh and warm gave her a subtle comfort.

And Ling Xia towards the literary gifted, delicate and sensitive Tianyi, quietly fall in love, and if…>
